name: A. How Much Does Daytona Cost
statement:
We define an integer to be on a subsegment, if its number of occurrences
on that subsegment is larger than the number of occurrences of any other
integer in that subsegment. A subsegment of an array is a consecutive
segment of elements in the array a.Given an array a of size n, and an
integer k, determine if there exists a non-empty subsegment of a where k
is .
